name: Hoodlum (MikeWill)
description:
Buy low. Sell high. Stay low or go on a rampage in our third person stealth action RPG. Hide amongst the crowd and make deals to lead your way victory or openly hunt down your opponents.

Inspired by Assassins Creed: Black Flag, Grand Theft Auto, and Fallout. Fight in the shadows or hidden in the crowd, go anywhere at any time, and engage in hundreds of NPC dialog options and chooses!

E-mail us at mikwllms257@gmail.com, feel free to post your suggestions, ideas, and critics.

(Under constant development / Life-Time development)
